custom-sql.sql: SELECT sessionContent.* FROM Course_SessionContent sessionContent JOIN Schedule_CDTSession cdtSession ON cdtSession.sessionId = sessionContent.sessionId WHERE sessionContent.courseId = ? AND cdtSession.start > ? AND cdtSession.start < ?

SELECT homework.* FROM Course_Homework homework JOIN Schedule_SessionTeacher sessionTeacher ON sessionTeacher.sessionId = homework.targetSessionId WHERE sessionTeacher.teacherId = ? AND homework.homeworkType = 1
